entry.title: $1995 // NEW 1 BD! DISHWASHER*ELEVATOR*NEW BUILDING*NO FEE !!
entry.content:
GORGEOUS BRAND NEW ONE BEDROOM APARTMENT IN A STUNNING BUILDING IN PRIME EAST WILLIAMSBURG!!!!

Contact Al for a viewing: show contact info

Amenities:
Queen sized bedroom
Large windows offer tons of natural sun light at all points in the day.
Modern kitchen with plenty of counter and storage space.
All new STAINLESS STEEL appliances including DISHWASHER!
oversized bathroom offers maximum privacy for residents.
Split Unit Air Condition and Heat throughout the apartment.
Tons of closet space in the bedroom.
Hardwood floors in the living-room and bedroom!

There is an amazing Communal Roof Deck Outdoor space with views of the city!

*ELEVATOR IN BUILDING

Right on Knickerbocker Avenue near brand new restaurants, shops, grocery stores, and bars!
One minute walk from the M and L trains: a ride to Manhattan in minutes!

PETS ALLOWED
NO FEE
GUARANTORS WELCOME*

Contact Al for a viewing: show contact info
